channel.title: Can anyone do free 10th lobby(xbl)
channel.description:
Hey guys i have had alot of bad shit been happen to me and im not tryign to make anyone feel sorry for me cause i know you guys don't care.
Now if anyone can please do me a lobby i would love you forever i don't have any microsoft points and im trying to get in one for free! Please <3
edit : MW2 <3

item.title: Can anyone do free 10th lobby(xbl)
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:7, topic:406668”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=503667.msg3685299#msg3685299 date=1311803608]

I got in one for free a while ago…

I don’t know why you and hackers think someone would wanna pay for 10th prestige for an old game… I LOL at that logic.

Through system link, people do it free all the time because it is free to host them like that. For actual Challenge lobbies people charge because they have to use Keyvault to host them. Keyvault can cost anywhere from 20$ to 200$, depending on what they are being used for.

You don’t really know what a keyvault is, do you?
[/quote]
Isn’t it used to unban your gt?[/quote]
Consoles. Basically every console has a unique keyvault. When someone gets console banned, its the keyvault that is banned. A J-Tagged Xbox has the ability to read & overwrite the keyvault. So some people will copy the keyvaults from their unbanned Xbox, and sell them to people who have banned keyvaults so they can unban their consoles.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone do free 10th lobby(xbl)
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

This is off topic but i suggest you don’t do it, hacking imo is stupid and lame and its just so much more fun knowing you worked for your gear and prestige’s, rather then getting it all in one day, being a fake like everyone else, and wasting money.

Read full topic
